abstract: Op-Ed article by former British forces commander Richard Kemp faults United Nations Human Rights Council report for laying blame for 2014 Gaza conflict on Israel's shoulders; charges report presents presumption of guilt based on flawed evidence and demonstrates little understanding of warfare; contends report's recommendation to immediately lift blockade of Gaza would result in further bloodshed on both sides of conflict.
lead_paragraph: A United Nations report on last summer’s Gaza war misses its target.

headline.main: The U.N.’s Gaza Report Is Flawed and Dangerous

snippet: A United Nations report on last summer’s Gaza war misses its target.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
